Outdoor Kitchens

Designed & Built by Pacific Hardscapes

Enjoy the pleasure of cooking outdoor with a kitchen from Pacific Hardscapes. We offer three different solutions for getting you the outdoor kitchen of your dreams. We can design and build your custom outdoor kitchen from the ground up using segmental blocks and traditional masonry products. We can design and build it using kitchen cabinets (components) and finish it with stone veneer. Or, we can just install a prebuilt island.

Custom Built Kitchen Cabinets Prebuilt Island

Side Finish Blocks, Stone or Brick Stone Veneer Limited
